title: From batch system toward continuous UV/PS based AOP reactor: the case of tramadol effluent degradation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, 3,1244-1258
DOI: 10.1039/D4VA00103F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Weam Bou Karroum, Abbas Baalbaki, Amir Nasreddine, Nadim Oueidat, Antoine Ghauch
UVC/PS system fully degraded tramadol (TRA) in an aqueous medium. A continuous-flow system was developed and optimized for the degradation of [TRA] = 10 mg L−1.
